title: Bandbox, ca. 1845
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Frederick F. Thompson
description: Blue field. On box, man and woman in costume of about 1835, confronted by two men in Hindu costume; brown, pink and white. Cover in same color, has two buildings with framework of daisies.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bandbox, ca. 1845.
ca. 1845. Block-printed paper on pasteboard support. Gift of Mrs. Frederick F. Thompson. 1913-45-15-a,b.
